docs.title: Metered SaaS Logic
docs.text:
Usage-based billing made simple.

Track usage, calculate costs, and manage billing cycles for metered SaaS applications.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Event Tracking — Record usage events
  • Aggregation — Hourly/daily summaries
  • Credit Tracking — Pre-paid balance management

docs.title: Development Setup
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Metered-SaaS-Logic.git
cd Metered-SaaS-Logic
python -m venv .venv
.venv\Scripts\activate
pip install -e ".[dev]"

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
uv pip install git+https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Metered-SaaS-Logic.git

from metered_saas import UsageTracker

tracker = UsageTracker()
tracker.record("api_call", user="user-1", quantity=1)
